basics.name: Eisen Hower Oallesma
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Currently studying for my A.S. in Natural Science and B.A. in Information and Computer Science in Leeward and UH Manoa, respectfully. Expected to graduate this Spring, 2023, and next year's Fall, 2025.

education.area: Natural Science: Information and Computer Science (expected Spring, 2024)

highlights: Greet customers with a warm welcome, serving drinks and providing menus.
Bust tables and polishing for customers to use.
Took orders, prepared meals and collected payments.
Kepts food preparation area, equipment and utensils clean and sanitary.
Provided excellent customer service by greeting customers and meeting quality expectations
Handled deliveries (Lifted boxes, stocked them in their need-to-be location, checked items that are needed from the list and prepared items for future needs.)

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: CO - ICS - Basic Logic & Programming Level 1 & 2
awards.summary: Completion to providing an overview of the fundamentals of computer programming and taking a second semester of computer programming and the mathematics of computer.

awards.title: CO - ICS - Software Developer Specialist
awards.summary: Completion in learning how to develop applications in at least two object-oriented languages using data structures, recursions and graphical-user interfaces.
